Text:
Looks very interesting, but it took me two hours and thirteen minutes to get just 2.93 megs, giving me an average speed of just 383 bytes/second.

I have never encountered something like that, before. I will try to be patient enough...
Well I have played it in VLC and other players, but no English subtitles appears...
Info in incorrect - does not have English subtitles, just dutch,

English subs:

http://www.allsubs.org/subs-download/il-capo-dei-capi-corleone-daniele-liotti-2007-6-3-5-4-2/3725884/

These English subtitles were translated from the Dutch subtitles using Google Translator, 
therefore you may find it funny or frustrating, depending on your mood :) 
but at least you'll get a pretty good idea of what is going on..
Nice nice!! Thank you very much ==)))
